message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product that I believe you'll find incredibly valuable. Given its worth, I'm proposing an initial price of $1,500,000.  I'm open to discussing this further, so please let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but I believe my initial offer is closer to the true value of this product.  Would you consider meeting me halfway at $1,200,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit far from that number. I'm willing to go up to $1,050,000. I think that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.
